display_long_description:
OVERAY DESK is a next generation workspace that brings productivity and immersion together in virtual reality. 

With automatic sync to Windows, you can set up your ideal environment with just a few clicks.

[media]

# Up to 5 virtual monitors for free

Turn one screen into a spacious multi-monitor workspace in VR.


[media]

# Keep what you need in your space

Move beyond flat screens and place information anywhere around you.


[media]

# Write and sketch with XR Pen

Think and draw freely across your 3D space.


**More Features**

Designed to support your workflow in VR

- Flexible layouts and customizable presets
- Simple and intuitive interface
- Passthrough mode and diverse virtual environments


We’re constantly improving OVERAY DESK for even greater immersion and efficiency.

Discover the future of workspaces today.
